info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 사고를 목격한 부인은 경찰의 질문에 어떤 대답들을 했을까요?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Would you tell me what you saw when the accident happened?
sentense.en_: Would you tell me what you saw when the accident happened?
sentense.ko: 사고가 났을 때 무엇을 보았는지 말씀해 주시겠습니까?

sentense.en: Yes, I was driving home from work. It was getting dark.
sentense.en_: Yes, I was driving home from work. It was getting dark.
sentense.ko: 네, 직장에서 집으로 운전하고있었습니다. 어두어지고 있었어요.

sentense.en: There weren't many cars on the road.
sentense.en_: There weren't many cars on the road.

sentense.en: Suddenly, a red sports car passed by me really fast.
sentense.en_: Suddenly, a red sports car passed by me really fast.
sentense.ko: 갑자기, 빨간 스포츠카가 정말 빨리 지나갔습니다.

sentense.en: After a few seconds, I heard a crash and saw that the car had hit a tree.
sentense.en_: After a few seconds, I heard a crash and saw that the car had hit a tree.
sentense.ko: 몇 초 후, 나는 충돌을 들었고 차가 나무에 부딪힌 것을 보았다.

sentense.en: I see. Now, how fast do you think the car was going?
sentense.en_: I see. Now, how fast do you think the car was going?
sentense.ko: 알겠습니다. 차가 얼마나 빨리 달렸다고 있다고 생각합니까?

sentense.en: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour,
sentense.en_: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour,

sentense.en: so it must have been going a lot faster than that.
sentense.en_: so it must have been going a lot faster than that.
words: 현재에 대해 강한 추측을 하면 'must'를 사용하고 과거에 대해 강한 추측을 하면 'must have p.p.'를 사용

sentense.en: What did you do after you saw the accident?
sentense.en_: What did you do after you saw the accident?
sentense.ko: 사고를 목격 한 후 무었을 했습니다.

sentense.en: I stopped my car, and checked whether anyone was hurt.
sentense.en_: I stopped my car, and checked whether anyone was hurt.
sentense.ko: 나는 차를 멈추고 누가 다쳤는지 확인했습니다.
words: 상처, 상처를 입히다, 부상, 부상을 입히다, 다치다

sentense.en: so I called 911, and that ambulance arrived here just before you.
sentense.en_: so I called 911, and that ambulance arrived here just before you.
sentense.ko: 그래서 나는 911에 전화했고, 구급차가 여기 당신옆에 도착했습니다.
